entry.title: Monday night: Clear. Low minus 25.
entry.summary: Clear. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 25. Wind chill minus 20 this evening and minus 33 overnight. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 4:00 PM MDT Monday 13 March 2023

entry.title: Tuesday: Chance of flurries. High minus 15. POP 30%
entry.summary: Increasing cloudiness early in the morning. 30 percent chance of flurries late in the afternoon. Wind becoming northeast 20 km/h near noon. High minus 15. Wind chill minus 33 in the morning and minus 24 in the afternoon. Risk of frostbite. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 4:00 PM MDT Monday 13 March 2023
